Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is from 2016 and has no link to Rajasthan or farmers. It was actually an incident in Rajkot, Gujarat, where an elderly man was tied and beaten by a policeman for allegedly raping his daughter-in-law.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by stating that the farmer was beaten up by the police in public for his inability to repay a 1,000 rupee loan, when the actual incident had a different context.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading image that has been falsely attributed to an incident in Rajasthan involving a farmer and the police.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is related to the incident being described, when in fact it is from a completely different incident in a different state.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, which is that it depicts an incident of a policeman beating an elderly man accused of raping his daughter-in-law in Rajkot, Gujarat.
